channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Andrews First Post
item.description: Github Markdown Example Headers Markdown makes use of the hash symbol to signify a header, the number of hashes shows the header size “#” - Header 1 “##” - Header 2 “###” Header 3 Links Links can be done in 2 ways, either the full length URL, or a shortened hyperlink Direct URL = https://www.google.co.uk Google Link You can also link to a file in the repository README Tables Tables can be formatted using the " | and -" icons
